00025 #ifndef SYX_PLATFORM_H
00026 #define SYX_PLATFORM_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-config.h"
00029 
00030 #define _SYX_XSTRINGIFY(s) #s
00031 #define SYX_STRINGIFY(s) _SYX_XSTRINGIFY(s)
00032 
00033 #define SYX_IMAGE_PATH SYX_STRINGIFY(IMAGE_PATH)
00034 #define SYX_ROOT_PATH SYX_STRINGIFY(ROOT_PATH)
00035 #define SYX_PLUGIN_PATH SYX_STRINGIFY(PLUGIN_PATH)
00036 
00037 /* Version */
00038 
00039 #define SYX_VERSION "0.1.7"
00040 
00041 /* Inline */
00042 
00043 #undef INLINE
00044 #if defined (HAVE_INLINE) && defined (__GNUC__)
00045 # define INLINE static __inline__
00046 #elif !defined (HAVE_INLINE)
00047 # if defined (HAVE__INLINE__)
00048 #  define INLINE static __inline__
00049 # elif defined (HAVE__INLINE)
00050 #  define INLINE static __inline
00051 # else
00052 #  define INLINE static
00053 # endif
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 /* Byte swapping */
00057 
00058 #ifdef HAVE_BYTESWAP_H
00059 #include <byteswap.h>
00060 #define syx_bswap_16(x) bswap_16(x)
00061 #define syx_bswap_32(x) bswap_32(x)
00062 #else
00063 #define syx_bswap_16(x)                                 \
00064   ((((x) & 0xff00) >> 8) | (((x) & 0x00ff) << 8))
00065 #define syx_bswap_32(x)                                      \
00066   ((((x) & 0xff000000) >> 24) | (((x) & 0x00ff0000) >> 8) |  \
00067    (((x) & 0x0000ff00) << 8) | (((x) & 0x000000ff) << 24))
00068 #endif /* HAVE_BYTESWAP_H */
00069 
00070 /* Swap for big endian machines */
00071 
00072 #ifdef WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00073 
00075 #define SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16(x) syx_bswap_16(x)
00076 
00078 #define SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_32(x) syx_bswap_32(x)
00079 
00080 #else /* WORDS_BIGENDIAN */
00081 
00083 #define SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16(x) (x)
00084 
00086 #define SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_32(x) (x)
00087 
00088 #endif /* WORDS_BIGENDIAN */
00089 
00090 /* Some platform specific informations */
00091 
00092 /* TODO: use "extern" then remove it from headers */
00093 #ifdef WINDOWS
00094 # define SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR '\\'
00095 # define SYX_ENV_PATH_SEPARATOR ';'
00096 # define SYX_ENV_PATH_SEPARATOR_S ";"
00097 # ifdef _DLL
00098 #  define EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00099 # else
00100 #  define EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00101 # endif /* _DLL */
00102 #else /* !WINDOWS */
00103 # define SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR '/'
00104 # define SYX_ENV_PATH_SEPARATOR ':'
00105 # define SYX_ENV_PATH_SEPARATOR_S ":"
00106 # define EXPORT
00107 #endif /* WINDOWS */
00108 
00109 #ifndef HAVE_ERRNO_H
00110 EXPORT extern int errno;
00111 # define ERANGE -32
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 /* Standard C calling conventions aren't the fastest possible, so for fastests
00115    possible code, it's good to compile with e.g. fast call conventions.
00116    If we're compiling with non-standard calling conventions, some functions
00117    need to be explicitly marked as using standard c calling conventions.
00118    Those functions are:
00119    * main()
00120    * those that use vararg (...) argument
00121 */
00122 #ifdef WINDOWS
00123 #define SYX_CDECL __cdecl
00124 #else
00125 #define SYX_CDECL
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 /* C++ specific */
00129 
00130 #ifdef __cplusplus
00131 # define SYX_BEGIN_DECLS  extern "C" {
00132 # define SYX_END_DECLS    }
00133 #else
00134 # define SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00135 # define SYX_END_DECLS
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 /* Time */
00139 
00140 #define SYX_NSEC_PER_USEC   1000L
00141 #define SYX_NSEC_PER_SEC 1000000000L
00142 
00143 #endif /* SYX_PLATFORM_H */
